message.entry: 在批处理作业开始时，工作进程无法将文件夹更改为 ''{0}''。该作业将从 ''{1}'' 执行。要从不同文件夹执行，请使用 {2} 的 'CurrentFolder' 参数。要隐藏此警告，请将 'CurrentFolder' 设置为 '.'。
批处理作业运行函数: {0}。
批处理更改了它处理元胞数组输入参数的方式。语法 batch(@fcn, N, '{{'x1,...,xn'}}') 使工作进程计算 fcn('{'x1,...,xn'}') 而不是 fcn(x1,...,xn)。要在工作进程上计算 fcn(x1,...,xn)，请改用语法 batch(@fcn, N, '{'x1,...,xn'}')。
{0,number,integer} output arguments were requested from {1}, but {2,number,integer} were requested from {3}.
The number of output arguments, N, must be a nonnegative integer or a vector of nonnegative integers.

The job failed to run correctly but no error message was returned. This could be because the scheduler failed to start MATLAB correctly on the cluster, or because the files needed to run the batch job were unavailable to the MATLAB on the cluster. You may find more information in the debug log for this job. To find out more about debug logs look at the getDebugLog function in the documentation.
All inputs to load must be character vectors.
The job is in state {0}. To load data from a job it must be finished.
Load supports only batch jobs that run a script. When batch runs a function, use fetchOutputs to get a cell array containing the outputs.
Batch commands are not supported on multiple jobs.
The {0} argument must be a character vector.
''{0}'' 是 MATLAB 路径上的文件的名称。要使用批处理运行脚本 ''{0}''，请改用 ''{1}''。
The caller workspace for batch must be a structure.
The batch tasks do not require a caller workspace to be set.
Unable to open filename {0} for appending.\nReason: {1}.
无法自动附加属于包的文件。
The ''{0}'' argument to batch must be a cell array of character vectors.
变量 {0} 未定义。
正在进行作业调试日志通信:
已连接到具有 {0,number,integer} 个工作进程的并行池。
已连接到具有 {0,number,integer} 个工作进程的并行池(PreferredPoolNumWorkers)。
无法创建并行池，因为不支持在同一 MATLAB 会话中创建并发并行池。要删除现有池，请使用 delete(gcp(''nocreate''))。
The workers did not connect to the client within the allowed time of {0,number,integer} seconds.
Could not retrieve the task error messages.
Could not retrieve job state.
Could not retrieve the debug log.
正在销毁由 {1} 创建的 {0,number,integer} 个既有通信作业。
任务 ID {0,number,integer} 的错误消息: {1}
Error encountered while running the batch job. The error was:\n{0}
Failed to locate and destroy old interactive jobs.
Failed to initialize the interactive session.
Failed to start {0}.
Cell array of input functions must be the same size as the cell array of input arguments.
Input arguments parameter to batch must be a cell array of vector cell arrays, or a vector cell array.
A parallel pool is already running. Use ''delete(gcp)'' to shut down the existing pool.
The pool argument to batch must be 0 or unspecified when running vectorized scripts/functions.
将对工作进程调用的脚本或函数必须为单个字符向量或函数句柄。
The script or function that will be called on the worker must be a single character vector or function handle, or an array of character vectors or function handles.
The communicating job did not start within the allowed time of {0,number,integer} seconds.
The ''{0}'' argument to batch must be a scalar logical.
不存在具有此 {0} 的调试日志。
找不到由 {0} 创建的任何预先存在的通信作业。
''{0}'' is not a valid configuration name. Use [conf, allConf] = defaultParallelConfig to see all your configurations.
没有任务错误消息。
Batch commands are only supported on jobs created with the ''batch'' command.
NumberOfOutputArguments must be the same size as the cell array of input arguments.
Number of output arguments must be specified when calling batch with a function.
The parallel pool job failed with no message.
The parallel pool job errored with the following message: {0}
The parallel pool job finished with no message.
The parallel pool job is unavailable. It is likely that the communicating job has been deleted.
The parallel pool job has been deleted.
PMODE has been removed. Use PARPOOL and SPMD instead.
您可以调用 ''delete(myCluster.Jobs)'' 删除由集群 myCluster 上的并行池创建的所有作业。
保留 ID 为 {0} 的作业，因为它们包含崩溃转储文件。
您可以使用 ''delete(myCluster.Jobs)'' 来删除使用配置文件 {0} 创建的所有作业。要创建 ''myCluster''，请使用 ''myCluster = parcluster(''{1}'')''。
The ''{0}'' argument must be a nonnegative scalar integer or a range [minWorkers, maxWorkers], where minWorkers is between 0 and maxWorkers, inclusive.
Command input to pctRunOnAll must be all character vectors.
pctRunOnAll must be run either from the client, or the leading task in a communicating job of type pool.
Cannot execute pctRunOnAll {0} when a parallel pool does not exist.
The parallel pool on which the command was run has been shut down.
发现由 {1} 创建的 {0,number,integer} 个预先存在的通信作业正在运行。{2}
仅在使用 Pool 选项通过并行池批量运行作业时，才必须指定 SpmdEnabled。
正在启动并行池(parpool)...
正在使用 ''{0}'' 配置文件启动并行池(parpool)...
The ''{0}'' argument to batch must be a character vector.
The ''{0}'' argument to batch must be a space delimited character vector or a cell array of character vectors.
Failed to store the variable {0} on the client.
Failed to store the variable {0} on worker {1,number,integer}.
未找到与 ''{0}'' 匹配的变量。
Variable {0} is undefined in the MATLAB client.
Batch cannot be used to run multiple scripts or functions.
通信作业返回了一个 Composite 或分布式数组。由于并行池关闭，数据已丢失。请考虑在返回 Composite 或分布式数组之前使用 DSAVE 或 GATHER。
批处理作业发出以下警告:\n{0}
The ''Workspace'' property must have a value.
The workspace argument to batch must be the same size as the array of script names.
